name: Individual Applicant Mesh (IAM) MCP Server
description: MCP server for job search automation, resume management, and application tracking
long_description: The Individual Applicant Mesh (IAM) MCP Server provides comprehensive tools for job seekers including job search via JSearch API, resume aggregation and meshing, job-specific resume generation, and tailored cover letter creation. Built on the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for seamless integration with AI assistants.

jsearch_api_key.title: JSearch API Key
jsearch_api_key.description: Your RapidAPI key for the JSearch job search API

tools.name: search_jobs
tools.description: Search for job openings based on role, location, and platform preferences

prompts.name: analyze_job_market
prompts.description: Analyze the job market for top jobs for a given role and location
prompts.text: Generated at runtime. The server injects the user-provided role, optional location details, and platform preferences into a markdown workflow that guides the MCP host through planning, invoking the search_jobs tool, and summarising trends.

prompts.name: save_jobs
prompts.description: Generate instructions for saving job search results to a structured JSON file
prompts.text: Generated at runtime. Produces detailed JSON-saving instructions tailored to the provided directory, role, location, and result count, including validation steps and metadata requirements.

prompts.name: mesh_resumes
prompts.description: A comprehensive prompt for meshing multiple resumes into a single resume. This prompt guides the LLM through the process of converting, cleaning, extracting, and merging information from multiple resume files into a single comprehensive document.
prompts.text: Generated at runtime. Instructs the MCP host to combine multiple resume sources into a unified markdown document saved in the requested directory with the configured mesh filename and timestamp.

prompts.name: generate_resume
prompts.description: Generate a resume for a given role, company and job description
prompts.text: Generated at runtime. Crafts a structured resume prompt incorporating the provided role, company, and job description, and instructs the MCP host to persist the output in the supplied directory.

prompts.name: generate_cover_letter
prompts.description: Generate a cover letter for a given role, company and job description
prompts.text: Generated at runtime. Produces a cover-letter workflow aligned with the supplied job context and directs the MCP host to save the rendered markdown in the specified directory.
